name: Super Bit Bash
description:
SUPER BIT BASH is retro dashing and jumping game with intuitive touch controls! Relive the NES and SNES gaming days with this classic platformer!


------------------------------------

SWIPE TO DASH!

DASH TO SURVIVE!

------------------------------------

FEATURES:

-GAMECENTER and Openfeint achievements and leaderboards
-8-bit inspired art
-Intuitive Touch controls
-Old School platforming action using swipes and taps - no clunky virtual d-pads.
-8-bit inspired soundtrack
-Unlock quirky characters
-Unlock new powerups

GET READY. SET. DASH!!!!

-----------------------

REVIEWS:

Gamezebo: 4.5* - With its mix of fantastic controls and almost endless appeal, this is one game you owe yourself to check out.

Williams Yee: 5* - Awesome retro game! - Super bit dash, it is like 8bit of jetpack joyride. :)

al909_ 5* - To good. Way to addictive.
